    JsonRepository
    This class is responsible for reading and writing the settings of the application.
    KaraokeController
    This controller handles the synchronization of karaoke lines with the current playback time of a song.
    KaraokeLine
    Represents a single line in a karaoke file (LRC).
    Language
    The Language enumeration.
    LanguageService
    LanguageService Manages application language settings and retrieves localized messages.
    Launcher
    Launcher class that extends the JavaFX Application class.
    Library
    Library class to store songs.
    LibraryController
    The controller for the Main Library view.
    LibraryTypeAdapter
     
    LibraryView
    The MainLibrary view.
    LibraryView.LibraryViewListener
    Listener interface used to delegate actions from the view to the controller logic.
    LyricsController
    The type Lyrics controller.
    LyricsNotFoundException
     
    LyricsOperationException
    Exception thrown when a lyrics operation fails.
    LyricsRepository
    Repository for managing lyrics file paths.
    LyricsRepository.LyricsFilePaths
    Store both the text and karaoke paths for a song
    LyricsService
    Service class for managing song lyrics.
    LyricsView
    The LyricsView class is responsible for displaying and updating the lyrics of a song.
    LyricsView.KaraokeListener
     
    LyricsView.LyricsViewListener
    Listener interface for handling events in the LyricsView.
    Main
    Main class that works around JavaFX module system requirements.
    MediaPlayerController

    MetaController.Scenes
    Enum for the different scenes in the application.
    Metadata
    Represents metadata associated with a song.
    MetadataService
     
    MiniPlayerController
    Controller managing the MiniPlayerView and processing audio spectrum data received on `spectrumDataUpdate`
    MiniPlayerView
    View component used to render the audio spectrum visualizer in a separate window (popup)
    MiniPlayerView.MiniPlayerViewListener
    Listener interface for handling user actions from the controller.
    PathRepository
     
    PlayerController
    Controller class for the music player.
    PlayerView
    PlayerView Class that represents the view of the music player.
    PlayerView.PlayerViewListener
    Listener interface for handling user actions from the controller.
    PlaylistCell
    A custom ListCell for displaying a playlist in a ListView.
    PlaylistCell.PlaylistCellListener
    The listener interface for handling playlist cell events.
    PlaylistCellController
    The type Playlist cell controller.
    PlaylistCellView
    The PlaylistCellView class is responsible for displaying a cell of a playlist.
    PlaylistCellView.PlaylistCellViewListener
    Listener interface for handling events or retrieving data for the PlaylistCellView.
    PlaylistContextMenuController
     
    PlaylistContextMenuView
